tika-vin05t16:1_0: 79. Duvidhaṁ sahaseyyakanti “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṁ
tika-vin05t16:1_1: sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya, pācittiyaṁ. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappeyya,
tika-vin05t16:1_2: pācittiya”nti evaṁ vuttaṁ sahaseyyasikkhāpadadvayaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Tatrāyaṁ vinicchayo
tika-vin05t16:1_3: – anupasampannena saddhiṁ tiṇṇaṁ rattīnaṁ upari catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye
tika-vin05t16:1_5: vā ekakkhaṇe vā nipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ. Tattha chadanaṁ anāhacca diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena
tika-vin05t16:1_6: pākārādinā yena kenaci paricchannampi sabbaparicchannamicceva veditabbaṁ. Yaṁ senāsanaṁ
tika-vin05t16:1_7: upari pañcahi chadanehi aññena vā kenaci sabbameva paricchannaṁ, idaṁ sabbacchannaṁ
tika-vin05t16:1_8: nāma senāsanaṁ. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana pākaṭavohāraṁ gahetvā vācuggatavasena “sabbacchannaṁ
tika-vin05t16:1_9: nāma pañcahi chadanehi channa”nti vuttaṁ. Kiñcāpi vuttaṁ, atha kho dussakuṭiyaṁ sayantassapi
tika-vin05t16:1_10: na sakkā anāpatti kātuṁ, tasmā yaṁ kiñci paṭicchādanasamatthaṁ idha chadanañca paricchannañca
tika-vin05t16:1_11: veditabbaṁ. Pañcavidhacchadaneyeva hi gayhamāne padaracchannepi sahaseyyā na bhaveyya,
tika-vin05t16:1_12: tasmā yaṁ senāsanaṁ bhūmito paṭṭhāya yāvachadanaṁ āhacca pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci
tika-vin05t16:1_13: antamaso vatthenapi parikkhittaṁ, idaṁ sabbaparicchannaṁ nāma senāsanaṁ. Chadanaṁ
tika-vin05t16:1_14: anāhacca sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārādinā parikkhittampi
tika-vin05t16:1_15: sabbaparicchannameva. Yassa pana upari bahutaraṁ ṭhānaṁ channaṁ, appaṁ acchannaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:1_16: samantato vā bahutaraṁ parikkhittaṁ, appaṁ aparikkhittaṁ, idaṁ yebhuyyenachannaṁ
tika-vin05t16:2_0: Iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgato sacepi sattabhūmiko pāsādo ekūpacāro hoti, satagabbhaṁ
tika-vin05t16:2_1: vā catusālaṁ, ekaṁ senāsanamicceva saṅkhaṁ gacchati. Evarūpe senāsane anupasampannena
tika-vin05t16:2_2: saddhiṁ catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye nipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ vuttaṁ. Sace pana
tika-vin05t16:2_3: sambahulā sāmaṇerā, eko bhikkhu, sāmaṇeragaṇanāya pācittiyā. Te ce uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t16:2_4: nipajjanti, tesaṁ payoge payoge bhikkhussa āpatti, bhikkhussa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjane
tika-vin05t16:2_5: pana bhikkhusseva payogena bhikkhussa āpatti. Sace sambahulā bhikkhū, eko sāmaṇero,
tika-vin05t16:2_6: ekopi sabbesaṁ āpattiṁ karoti. Tassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya nipajjanenapi bhikkhūnaṁ āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t16:3_0: 80. Apicettha ekāvāsādikampi catukkaṁ veditabbaṁ. Yo hi ekasmiṁ āvāse ekeneva anupasampannena
tika-vin05t16:3_1: saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassa catutthadivasato paṭṭhāya devasikā āpatti.
tika-vin05t16:3_2: Yopi ekasmiṁyeva āvāse nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t16:3_3: Yopi nānāāvāsesu ekeneva anupasampannena saddhiṁ tirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappeti, tassapi.
tika-vin05t16:3_4: Yopi nānāāvāsesu nānāanupasampannehi saddhiṁ yojanasatampi gantvā sahaseyyaṁ kappeti,
tika-vin05t16:4_0: Ayañca sahaseyyāpatti nāma “bhikkhuṁ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato
tika-vin05t16:4_1: antamaso pārājikavatthubhūtena tiracchānagatenapi saddhiṁ hoti, tasmā sacepi godhābiḷālamaṅgusādīsu
tika-vin05t16:4_2: koci pavisitvā bhikkhuno vasanasenāsane ekūpacāraṭṭhāne sayati, sahaseyyāva hoti.
tika-vin05t16:4_3: Yadi pana thambhānaṁ upari katapāsādassa uparimatalena saddhiṁ asambaddhabhittikassa
tika-vin05t16:4_4: bhittiyā upariṭhitasusiratulāsīsassa susirena pavisitvā tulāya abbhantare sayitvā
tika-vin05t16:4_5: teneva susirena nikkhamitvā gacchati, heṭṭhāpāsāde sayitabhikkhussa anāpatti. Sace
tika-vin05t16:4_6: chadane chiddaṁ hoti, tena pavisitvā antochadane vasitvā teneva pakkamati, nānūpacāre
tika-vin05t16:4_7: uparimatale chadanabbhantare sayitassa āpatti, heṭṭhimatale sayitassa anāpatti. Sace
tika-vin05t16:4_8: antopāsādeneva ārohitvā sabbatalāni paribhuñjanti, ekūpacārāni honti, tesu yattha
tika-vin05t16:4_9: katthaci sayitassa āpatti, sabhāsaṅkhepena kate aḍḍhakuṭṭake senāsane sayitassa tulāvāḷasaghāṭādīsu
tika-vin05t16:4_10: kapotādayo sayanti, āpattiyeva. Parikkhepassa bahigate nibbakosabbhantare sayanti,
tika-vin05t16:4_11: anāpatti. Parimaṇḍalaṁ vā caturassaṁ vā ekacchadanāya gabbhamālāya satagabbhaṁ cepi
tika-vin05t16:4_12: senāsanaṁ hoti, tatra ce ekena sādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā visuṁ pākārena aparicchinnagabbhūpacāre
tika-vin05t16:4_13: sabbagabbhepi pavisanti, ekagabbhepi anupasampanne nipanne sabbagabbhesu nipannānaṁ
tika-vin05t16:4_14: āpatti. Sace sapamukhā gabbhā honti, pamukhañca upari acchannaṁ, pamukhe sayito gabbhe
tika-vin05t16:4_15: sayitānaṁ āpattiṁ na karoti. Sace pana gabbhacchadaneneva saddhiṁ sambandhachadanaṁ,
tika-vin05t16:4_16: tatra sayito sabbesaṁ āpattiṁ karoti. Kasmā? Sabbacchannattā ca sabbaparicchannattā
tika-vin05t16:5_0: 81. Yepi ekasāladvisālatisālacatusālasannivesā mahāpāsādā ekasmiṁ okāse pāde dhovitvā
tika-vin05t16:5_1: paviṭṭhena sakkā honti sabbattha anuparigantuṁ, tesupi sahaseyyāpattiyā na muccati.
tika-vin05t16:5_2: Sace tasmiṁ tasmiṁ ṭhāne upacāraṁ paricchinditvā katā honti, ekūpacāraṭṭhāneyeva
tika-vin05t16:5_3: āpatti. Dvīhi dvārehi yuttassa sudhāchadanamaṇḍapassa majjhe pākāraṁ karonti, ekena
tika-vin05t16:5_4: dvārena pavisitvā ekasmiṁ paricchede anupasampanno sayati, ekasmiṁ bhikkhu, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t16:5_5: Pākāre godhādīnaṁ pavisanamattaṁ chiddaṁ hoti, ekasmiñca paricchede godhā sayanti,
tika-vin05t16:5_6: anāpattiyeva. Na hi chiddena gehaṁ ekūpacāraṁ nāma hoti. Sace pākāramajjhe chinditvā
tika-vin05t16:5_7: dvāraṁ yojenti, ekūpacāratāya āpatti. Taṁ dvāraṁ kavāṭena pidahitvā sayanti, āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t16:5_8: Na hi dvārapidahanena gehaṁ nānūpacāraṁ nāma hoti, dvāraṁ vā advāraṁ. Kavāṭañhi saṁvaraṇavivaraṇehi
tika-vin05t16:5_9: yathāsukhaṁ vaḷañjanatthāya kataṁ, na vaḷañjupacchedanatthāya. Sace taṁ dvāraṁ puna
tika-vin05t16:5_10: iṭṭhakāhi pidahanti, advāraṁ hoti, purime nānūpacārabhāveyeva tiṭṭhati. Dīghapamukhaṁ
tika-vin05t16:5_11: cetiyagharaṁ hoti, ekaṁ kavāṭaṁ anto, ekaṁ bahi, dvinnaṁ kavāṭānaṁ antare anupasampanno
tika-vin05t16:6_0: Ayañhettha saṅkhepo – senāsanaṁ khuddakaṁ vā hotu mahantaṁ vā, aññena saddhiṁ sambandhaṁ
tika-vin05t16:6_1: vā asambandhaṁ vā, dīghaṁ vā vaṭṭaṁ vā caturassaṁ vā, ekabhūmikaṁ vā anekabhūmikaṁ
tika-vin05t16:6_2: vā, yaṁ yaṁ ekūpacāraṁ, sabbattha sahaseyyāpatti hotīti. Ettha ca yena kenaci paṭicchadanena
tika-vin05t16:6_4: pācittiyaṁ, sabbacchanne yebhuyyenaparicchanne pācittiyaṁ, sabbacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne
tika-vin05t16:6_5: pācittiyaṁ, yebhuyyenachanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne pācittiyaṁ, sabbaparicchanne yebhuyyenachanne
tika-vin05t16:6_6: pācittiyaṁ, sabbaparicchanne upaḍḍhacchanne pācittiyaṁ, yebhuyyenaparicchanne upaḍḍhacchanne
tika-vin05t16:6_7: pācittiyanti aṭṭha pācittiyāni. Upaḍḍhacchanne upaḍḍhaparicchanne dukkaṭaṁ, sabbacchanne
tika-vin05t16:6_8: cūḷakaparicchanne dukkaṭaṁ, yebhuyyenachanne cūḷakaparicchanne dukkaṭaṁ, sabbaparicchanne
tika-vin05t16:6_9: cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭaṁ, yebhuyyenaparicchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭanti pañca dukkaṭāni
tika-vin05t16:6_10: veditabbāni. Sabbacchanne sabbaaparicchanne, sabbaparicchanne sabbaacchanne, yebhuyyenaacchanne
tika-vin05t16:6_12: cūḷakaparicchanne ca anāpatti. Mātugāmena saha nipajjantassapi ayameva vinicchayo.
tika-vin05t16:6_13: Ayañhettha viseso – anupasampannena saddhiṁ nipajjantassa catutthadivase āpatti,
tika-vin05t16:6_14: mātugāmena saddhiṁ paṭhamadivaseti. Yakkhipetīhi pana dissamānakarūpāhi tiracchānagatitthiyā
tika-vin05t16:6_15: ca methunadhammavatthubhūtāya eva dukkaṭaṁ, sesāhi anāpatti.
